short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: OmniDebugger is a powerful Chrome extension tool designed to help you debug any page on your browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
**Extension Name:** OmniDebugger

**Description:** OmniDebugger is a powerful Chrome extension tool designed to help you debug any page on your browser. Whether it's an online page or a local page, OmniDebugger can assist you in easily solving various issues. This tool supports delayed debugging, allowing you to pause JavaScript execution when needed, making it easy to locate and resolve problems quickly.

**Key Features:**
- **Comprehensive Debugging:** Supports debugging of any page on the browser, regardless of whether it's online or local.
- **Delayed Debugging:** Can pause JavaScript execution, helping you locate and resolve problems more easily.
- **Simple and Easy to Use:** User-friendly interface and simple operation make it easy for even beginners to get started.

**How to Use:**
1. Install the OmniDebugger extension in your Chrome browser.
2. Open Chrome Developer Tools on the page you want to debug.
3. Enable delayed debugging in OmniDebugger.
4. Execute JavaScript code on the page, and OmniDebugger will pause execution when needed, allowing you to perform debugging operations.

OmniDebugger is your ideal choice for debugging browser pages. Try it out now!
